mission-docs-money-leak.instruction: Create the requested insight reports for the Money Leak fixes. 1) Create communications/insights/WO-996-Housing-System-Money-Leak-Fix.md with the content from the PR review. 2) Update design/2_operations/ledgers/ECONOMIC_INSIGHTS.md with the zero-sum ledger insight. 3) Update design/2_operations/ledgers/TECH_DEBT_LEDGER.md with the firm management fallback insight. Use the PR review reports as source.

mission-thoughtstream-infra.instruction: Implement Phase 1 of ThoughtStream. 1) Create simulation/db/logger.py implementing SimulationLogger with batch inserts and WAL mode. 2) Update simulation/db/schema.py to include agent_thoughts and tick_snapshots tables. **CRITICAL: Use Context Manager (__enter__/__exit__) for DB connection management instead of __del__.** Refer to design/3_work_artifacts/specs/SPEC_THOUGHTSTREAM.md.
mission-thoughtstream-infra.title: ThoughtStream Infrastructure

mission-thoughtstream-probes.instruction: Implement Phase 2 of ThoughtStream. 1) Modify Household.decide_consumption and Firm.decide_production in simulation/core_agents.py to log decision reasoning (Check previous view_file for context) using simulation.logger. 2) Update simulation/engine.py to initialize SimulationLogger in __init__ and call simulation.logger.flush() at the very end of run_tick(). IMPORTANT: Use 'self.world_state.logger' or 'self.logger' attributes correctly based on the codebase structure.
mission-thoughtstream-probes.title: ThoughtStream Probes

mission-thoughtstream-verify.instruction: ThoughtStream implementation and verification complete. The system is now ready for Root Cause Analysis. See design/3_work_artifacts/reports/REPORT_THOUGHTSTREAM_IMPLEMENTATION.md for details.

mission-animal-phase3-recovery.instruction:
Implement Phase 3 of 'Animal Spirits' based on SPEC_ANIMAL_PHASE3_RECOVERY.md. 1) Create PublicManager class implementing IAssetRecoverySystem. 2) Insert Phase 4.5 (Asset Liquidation) into Simulation.run_tick(). 3) Implement bankruptcy event handling to transfer assets instead of destroying them.
